cmp: 步 (a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process)
mng: to scowl, to knit the brows

exm.mng: to scowl, to knit the brows
to impersonate sb but gain the opposite of the desired effect (idiom)
lit. Dong Shi imitates Xi Shi's frown (idiom), fig. to mimick sb's idiosyncrasies but make a fool of oneself
to knit one's brows, to frown
